name: NSTextBlock.VerticalAlignment
desc: The following constants specify values used by the property verticalAlignment to specify vertical alignment.

items.name: case topAlignment
items.desc: Aligns adjacent blocks at their top.

items.name: case middleAlignment
items.desc: Aligns adjacent blocks at their middle.

items.name: case bottomAlignment
items.desc: Aligns adjacent blocks at their bottom.

items.name: case baselineAlignment
items.desc: Aligns adjacent blocks at the baseline of the first line of text in the block.
